There are packed mixed vegetables ready to stir fry which you can find in British supermarkets.

# Simplest Cooking

1. **Stir fry**: Preheat the wok or pan over a high heat. Add 10ml of oil, stir fry for 6 mins. Stir continuously. If necessary, add a splash of water to prevent sticking and burnt.

::: {.callout-tip title="Cooking Tips"}
- The wok or pan should be large enough to get the veggies enough room to move around.
:::


# Varieties

1. Tenderstem broccoli + mangetout + mixed vegetables (pak choi + carrot + salad onion)
2. Mushroom + bean sprouts + cabbage + carrot + onion

# Storage

1. Keep refrigerated. Once opened use within 1 day.
2. Not freezable.
